snippet: The diplomat, Richard G. Olson, made the pledge at a confirmation hearing before the Senate Foreign Relations Committee.
abstract: Richard G Olson, Pres Obama's nominee to become ambassador to Pakistan, announces that his top priority would be to press the government there to take more forceful measures against the Taliban's Haqqani network; organization's leaders, sheltered in Pakistan, have mounted a series of attacks against American and other targets in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: The diplomat, Richard G. Olson, made the pledge at a confirmation hearing before the Senate Foreign Relations Committee.

headline.seo: Pakistani Envoy Nominee Speaks on Haqqani Network
headline.main: Envoy Nominee Pledges to Focus on Militant Group
